channel.title: Where to start?
channel.description:
I'm new to the whole RSPS thing and I'm looking to make a PS with pk point system and possible "duel anywhere" deal. Similar to RS1's pking but not open PK.
Idk where to start though, I see things about like 571 servers and source whatnot but I can't seem to find a good tutorial that doesn't have broken links. What would be the best server source+client source available/you would recommend?
Also is it possible to add like a whole new aspect to the game? Say like a custom point system for doing something and adding a npc to the game world to trade said points with? I have programming knowledge in java so i'd be prepared but I wouldn't know where to start.
Any help would be appreciated :)
EDIT: Seriously? No recommendations? That's depressing /:

item.title: Where to start?
item.dc:creator: @ThatBenderGuy ThatBenderGuy
